entry.title: Win10 系统多了 3D 对象文件夹怎么办
entry.content:
Win10系统多了3D对象文件夹怎么办？

  • Win10去掉3D对象文件夹：

1、按下WIN+R，然后输入regedit 回车；

2、然后找到：

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\MyComputer\NameSpace\

3、找到3D对象文件夹对应的{0DB7E03F-FC29-4DC6-9020-FF41B59E513A} 项，删除

4、然后我们再打开

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\MyComputer\NameSpace

5、继续删除{0DB7E03F-FC29-4DC6-9020-FF41B59E513A}

6、退出注册表，刷新一下，就会发现3D对象文件夹不见了。

好了win10系统去掉3D对象文件夹的方法就为大家介绍到这里啦，希望本教程对大家能有所帮助。

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
